name: Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld
name_original: Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld
description:
Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Бука. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld is available on PC.
Paul Romero, Rob King and Steve Baca scored the game.
